messages.message: For golden tests, how do we ensure that a marketplace package is available on all environment that the golden test is run on?

good question, this is similar to when a new sandbox is created the FS drive for golden needs to be mounted; now same for marketplace packages. @Hari @Ramesh is there already a process? there are golden tests that use marketplace packages right now. if not, let’s work out a process together in Q4.

On a side note, @maja’s internship project this fall is to build tools for moving marketplace solutions across environments. She’s in the process of integrating the work with control plane so if in the future environments are all created or update through CP, marketplace solutions will be taken care of. This will probably need to wait until end of Q4 / Jan to be fully ready. cc @Mohit
@Kerry There is no process yet on the marketplace process yet!! Sure let's put together something for Q4.
